descriptionHtml:
Do you want the Dragon Infusion perk?

Of course you do... because dragon attacks HURT LIKE OBLIVION!

But suppose you don't want anything to do with the Blades anymore because they want you to slaughter your old friend and mentor Paarthurnax...

Those selfish bastards!

So how can you get the Dragon Infusion perk without Esbern to make his potion?

Simple... you make it yourself.

Because in his haste to leave his hidey-hole in the Riften sewers, addle-brained old Esbern left behind a crucial tidbit of information... the recipe for his potion!

This mod adds two new ingredients and recipes to make them, along with the recipe for the potion itself. You'll find his notes on how to make it all in the crate next to Esbern's bed in his sewer hideout, partially covered by a book.

The two new ingredients are Powdered Dragon Bone and Purified Dragon Scales, which Esbern's note will show you how to make. Combined with other ingredients that will be listed, you'll be able to make Esbern's Potion without any help from the old man. However, you will need his notes in your possession if you want to make it. (Sorry, but it wouldn't be fair if you can make it right away after killing your first dragon.)

Comments and endorsements are welcome.

Enjoy.
author: CaptainRC
